title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 713-2.3 - Minimum bed capacities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 713-2.3 - Minimum bed capacities

State Regulations

Unless the commissioner approves fewer beds, a nursing
home unit of a hospital shall have a minimum of 30 certified beds and a
freestanding nursing home facility shall have a minimum of 60 certified
beds. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
713-2.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
